title: Peaches & Cream: a Ponygirl tale
description: When a financial reversal forces Katie Trammel to sell herself as a ponygirl, she never imagined that her nemesis from college, Veronica Kotter, might be one of the bidders.  Will Katie be bought by Veronica? Will she submit to Veronica demands or will she find happiness as a ponygirl?
author: Felicia Montoya
